rules.description: Post left_ctrl when return_or_enter is hold.
Post escape if caps is pressed alone, left_ctrl otherwise
Use left_control+u/i to cycle through running applications (like command+tab).
(Evan's Vim 1/11) left_command -> on, left_command, esc, control+[ or any pointing_button -> off
(Vim 2/11) finger on trackpad + any key -> off
Numeric Keypad Mode [Tab as trigger key]

to.shell_command: open -a mail && open -a calendar && open -a reminders && open -a Microsoft\ Teams
osascript -e 'quit app "Calendar"' && osascript -e 'quit app "Mail"' && osascript -e 'quit app "Reminders"' && osascript -e 'quit app "Microsoft Teams"'

rules.description: Quit application by pressing command-q twice

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to shut down'

rules.description: Map Shift + Backspace to Forward Delete
Evan's Vi Mode [D as Trigger Key & D+S for OS navigation]
